flawed_nl_solution:
The medical cost comes out to 45*10+250=$<<45*10+250=700>>700
Insurance covers 700*0.8=$<<700*0.8=560>>560
So he has to pay 700-560=$<<700-560=104>>104
Added to the cost of the trip he has to pay 1200+104=$<<1200+104=1304>>1304
#### 1304

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 140, not 104. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
